pkgdef.title: Upgrade1940
pkgdef.description: Upgrade To v{{CURRENT_BUILD_VERSION}} - This package upgrades the software running on your server to v{{CURRENT_BUILD_VERSION}}. Installation of this package suspends server operations, and after completing the software upgrade, resumes them. Do not install this package when maintenance activities are in progress. During installation, this package shuts down and restarts the server. Completion of this upgrade requires 1-4 hours depending on the amount of data stored on the server.

paParam.name: virtual
paParam.description: Physical machine upgrades require the support password.

paParam.name: AAVViVersionDep
paParam.description: AAVVInstaller version does not match the package version

paParam.name: versiondep
paParam.description: version does not match the package version

paParam.name: osversiondep
paParam.description: operating system is not SLES11SP1, SLES11SP3, SLES11SP4, SLES12SP4 or SLES12SP5

pkgdef.title: accelerator-upgrade
pkgdef.description: Upgrade To Accelerator v{{CURRENT_BUILD_VERSION}} - This package upgrades the Accelerator software that runs on the Accelerator server to v{{CURRENT_BUILD_VERSION}}. The upgrade suspends Accelerator server operations until the upgrade completes. Do not install the package while backup and restore activities are in progress. The upgrade takes about 5 minutes to complete.

paParam.name: AAVViVersionDep
paParam.description: AAVVInstaller version does not match the package version

paParam.name: osversiondep
paParam.description: operating system is not SLES11SP1, SLES11SP3, SLES11SP4, SLES12SP4 or SLES12SP5

paParam.name: versiondep
paParam.description: Accelerator version does not match the package version

paParam.name: configured
paParam.description: Accelerator is not installed and configured
